components.name: Measure
components.description: For keeping typographic measure in check

components.name: NavBar
components.jsx:
<header>
  <Container><Flex
    align="center"
    wrap
    px={0}
    py={3}>
    <NavLink ml={-2} href='https://compositor.io'>
      <Logo />
      Compositor
    </NavLink>
    <Box mx="auto" />
    {props.children}
  </Flex></Container>
</header>

components.name: HeroLeft
components.jsx:
<Container>
    <Flex
      flexDirection={[ 'column', 'row' ]}
      mx={-3}
      py={4}
      align="center">
      <Box
        px={3}
        py={4}
        width={[ 1, 384, 448 ]}
        style={{ flex: 'none' }}>
        {props.children}
      </Box>
      <Box
        px={3}
        py={2}
        mr={[ 0, -6 ]}
        width={[ 1 ]}
      >
        <Image src={props.image} />
      </Box>
    </Flex>
  </Container>

components.name: ProductLockUp
examples:
<ProductLockUp
  title='Iso'
  beta
  description='Build pages and prototypes with Lab UI components. No configuration or build setup required.'
/>

components.name: SectionLeft
components.jsx:
<Container>
  <Flex
    flexDirection={[ 'column', 'row' ]}
    mx={-3}
    py={5}
    align="center">
    <Box
      px={3}
      py={4}
      width={[ 1, 384, 448, 512 ]}
      style={{ flex: 'none' }}>
      {props.children}
    </Box>
    <Box
      px={3}
      py={2}
      width={[ 1 ]}
    >
      <Image src={props.image} />
    </Box>
  </Flex>
</Container>

components.name: SectionRight
components.jsx:
<Container>
  <Flex
    flexDirection={[ 'column', 'row' ]}
    mx={-3}
    py={5}
    align="center">
    <Box
      px={3}
      py={2}
      width={[ 1 ]}
    >
      <Image src={props.image} />
    </Box>
    <Box
      px={3}
      py={4}
      width={[ 1, 384, 448, 512 ]}
      style={{ flex: 'none' }}>
      {props.children}
    </Box>
  </Flex>
</Container>

components.name: MegaFooter
components.jsx:
<footer>
    <Box bg="black" color="white">
      <Container py={4}>
        <Flex align="flex-end" mx={-3} wrap>
          <Box px={3} py={3} width={[0.5, 0.5, 0.25]}>
            <Box>
              <NavLink href="https://compositor.io/">Compositor</NavLink>
            </Box>
            <Box>
              <NavLink href="https://compositor.io/lab/">Lab</NavLink>
            </Box>
            <Box>
              <NavLink href="https://compositor.io/iso/">Iso</NavLink>
            </Box>
          </Box>
          <Box px={3} py={3} width={[0.5, 0.5, 0.25]}>
            <Box>
              <NavLink href="https://compositor.io/blog/">Blog</NavLink>
            </Box>
            <Box>
              <NavLink href="https://github.com/c8r/lab-cli/">lab-cli</NavLink>
            </Box>
          </Box>
          <Box ml="auto" px={3} py={3} width={[1, 0.5, 0.5, 0.25]}>
            <Flex>
              <Box mx="auto" />
              <NavLink href="https://twitter.com/getcompositor/" mr={3}>
                <Image src="https://icon.now.sh/twitter/fff" />
              </NavLink>
              <NavLink href="https://github.com/c8r/">
                <Image src="https://icon.now.sh/github/fff" />
              </NavLink>
            </Flex>
            <form
              action="https://compositor.us1.list-manage.com/subscribe/post?u=80f1aa1145b57607ff718c03d&id=042073b294"
              method="post"
            >
              <Label>Email Address</Label>
              <Flex>
                <InputDark mr={1} name="EMAIL" />
                <FormButton px={2} bg="white" color="black">
                  Sign Up
                </FormButton>
              </Flex>
            </form>
          </Box>
        </Flex>
        <Flex align="baseline" py={3} wrap>
              <Link href='mailto:support@compositor.io'
                f={0}
                mr={3}
                mb={3}
                color='white'>
                support@compositor.io
              </Link>
          <Box mx="auto" />
          <Text fontSize={0} mr={3}>© 2017 Compositor, Inc.</Text>
          <Link color="white" f={0} href="/terms" mr={3}>
            Terms
          </Link>
          <Link color="white" f={0} href="/privacy">
            Privacy Policy
          </Link>
        </Flex>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  </footer>

components.name: GA
StripeStyles
components.jsx:
<style
  dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{
    __html: '.stripe-button-el { margin-right: 16px; padding: 0; box-shadow: none!important;} .stripe-button-el.stripe-button-el span { font-size:16px; line-height: inherit!important; height:auto!important;box-shadow: none!important; background: #0093ef!important; padding-right: 18px; padding-left: 18px; padding-bottom: 12px; padding-top: 12px;text-shadow: none!important; }'
  }}
/>

components.name: Testimonial
components.jsx:
<Box {...props}>
  <TestimonialText>
    “{props.text}”
  </TestimonialText>
  <Flex align='center' center mt={2}>
    <Avatar src={props.src} mr={2}/>
    <Caps children={props.author} />
  </Flex>
</Box>
examples:
<Testimonial 
author="Kent C. Dodds"
text="Lab is amazing. As someone who's very new to the design space, I was really impressed by how quickly I could throw some components together in the intuitive tool, generate the code, and run with it."
src='https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/759557613445001216/6M2E1l4q_400x400.jpg'
/>

<Testimonial 
author="Jules Forest"
text="Finally, a tool that lets you design actual UI components instead of drawing static pictures of them."
src='https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/916731555300511744/8Hfmup6d_400x400.jpg'
/>
